record.description: [Virobiology Exhibit model for the Brussels World's Fair 1958. Dr. James W. Moulder of the University of Chicago planned and supervised its construction on behalf of a National Science Foundation commission. Leon Hyzen designed the exhibit of 16 panels of photographs, electron micrographs, drawings, and diagrams that illustrate the fundamental concepts concerning the nature of viruses and the diseases produced.]
record.subject2: Exposition universelle et internationale (1958 : Brussels, Belgium)
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: From a memo and outline of the exhibition included in the folder. Negative on file. All photos were taken at Ricketts Laboratory North.
